android.car.hardware.power

接口 CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion

  • 封闭类:
    CarPowerManager

    public static interface CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion
    Applications set a CarPowerManager.CarPowerStateListenerWithCompletion for power state event updates where a CarPowerManager.CompletablePowerStateChangeFuture is used.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onStateChanged(int state, CarPowerManager.CompletablePowerStateChangeFuture future)
      Called when power state changes.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onStateChanged

        void onStateChanged(int state,
                    CarPowerManager.CompletablePowerStateChangeFuture future)
        Called when power state changes.

        Some states allow for completion and the listeners are supposed to tell the completion of handling the power state change. Those states include:

        • STATE_PRE_SHUTDOWN_PREPARE
        • STATE_SHUTDOWN_ENTER
        • STATE_SUSPEND_ENTER
        • STATE_HIBERNATION_ENTER
        • STATE_POST_SHUTDOWN_ENTER
        • STATE_POST_SUSPEND_ENTER
        • STATE_POST_HIBERNATION_ENTER
        If the listeners don't complete before the timeout expires, car power management service moves to the next step, anyway. The timeout given to the listener can be queried by CarPowerManager.CompletablePowerStateChangeFuture.getExpirationTime().
        参数:
        state - New power state of the system.
        future - CompletablePowerStateChangeFuture used by listeners to notify CarPowerManager that they are ready to move to the next step. Car power management service waits until the listeners call CompletablePowerStateChangeFuture#complete() or timeout happens. In the case state doesn't allow for completion, future is null.
